alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 01 at 6:27PM EDT until May 01 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ASHTABULA COUNTY... At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Orwell, or 15 miles southeast of Geneva-On-The-Lake, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Conneaut, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Rock Creek and Kelloggsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to ponding on area roadways. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
